name: Brute
perks: Replace one -1 card with one +1 card
Add one rolling DISARM card and one rolling MUDDLE card
Add one rolling ADD TARGET card
Ignore negative item effects and add one +1 card
description: The Brute is a tanky melee fighter who excels at absorbing damage and dealing consistent physical attacks. High health pool and straightforward combat abilities make this class ideal for beginners.

name: Tinkerer
perks: Replace one -1 card with one +1 card
description: The Tinkerer is a versatile support class capable of healing allies, buffing, and controlling enemies with gadgets and inventions. Large hand size allows for flexible tactical options.

name: Spellweaver
perks: Replace one -1 card with one +1 card
Add one rolling EARTH and one rolling AIR card
Add one rolling LIGHT and one rolling DARK card
description: The Spellweaver is a powerful elemental mage who channels Fire, Ice, Earth, Air, Light, and Dark elements. Low health but devastating area-of-effect spells make careful positioning critical.

name: Scoundrel
perks: Replace one -1 card with one +1 card
Replace one +0 card with one +2 card
description: The Scoundrel is a melee rogue specializing in single-target damage from advantageous positions. Gains bonus damage when attacking adjacent enemies, rewarding tactical movement and positioning.

name: Cragheart
perks: Replace one -1 card with one +1 card
Add one -2 card and two +2 cards
description: The Cragheart is a ranged/melee hybrid who manipulates obstacles and terrain. Deals damage to both enemies and allies, requiring careful positioning. Earth-focused abilities create and destroy obstacles.

name: Mindthief
perks: Replace two +1 cards with two +2 cards
Replace one -2 card with one +0 card
Add one rolling DISARM card and one rolling MUDDLE card
description: The Mindthief is an agile melee damage dealer who uses psychic powers and augments to control the battlefield. Can summon a rat companion and manipulate enemy positioning with mind control.
